original_title: EDSA XXX: Ganito kami noon, ganito pa rin kami ngayon
overview: EDSA XXX takes us on a wild ride through the ups and downs, twists and turns in the life of one manâ€™s downfall and the rise to fame of another. The present leader KULOG NEGRO has led the country to progress; his rallying call is championing poverty for the benefit of tourists and film festivals. But the well-meaning leader is a mere puppet in the political arena and someone has just decided that he has to go.
title: EDSA XXX: Nothing Ever Changes in the Ever-Changing Republic of Ek-Ek-Ek
